Detailed Description

Test error return codes for illegal MIDIFilePlayer parameters and illegal SMF content.

Author:
Phil Burk, Copyright 2005 Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL

Define Documentation

#define SAMPLE_RATE   (22050)
 

Function Documentation

int main (  void   ) 
 

Run all tests verifying that notes are correctly sounded and muted.

Returns:
0 if all tests succeed, non-0 otherwise.

int TestSMFErrors (  void   )
